title: The MITRE ATT&CK Framework [ML B-Side]
description: In some ways, cyber security is like Art - and that’s not a good thing… MITRE’s ATT&CK framework tries to make sense of the collective knowledge of the security community, and share that knowledge so that cyber defence become less an art form, and more about using the correct tools and technique. Nate Nelson, our Sr. producer, talks with Israel Barak - Cybereaon’s CISO and a regular guest of our podcast - about MITRE ATT&CK, and how it can help your organization stay safe.
